content: these fingerless mitts are super quick to make and beginner friendly 1 skein of lion brand wool ease thick and quick makes 1 adult size + a child size they are super customizable to fit any sized hand if you prefer video tutorial be sure to check out my youtube channel this pattern is free on my blog 1 or view the video tutorial 2 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/market-mitts-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=6c24pkpotlg
